name: Adventures of Old (TheDreadNite, Emily Wen, Kushiri, Brwonze, pbsulliv)
name_original: Adventures of Old (TheDreadNite, Emily Wen, Kushiri, Brwonze, pbsulliv)
description:
Adventures of Old is a multiplayer fantasy role-playing game where players form a party of 3-6 players team up to save the world from slipping into utter chaos.

In order to play the game, one player must first host a game.  That player must then give the 6 digit code that is generated to the other players, where they will input that in the join game screen.  Once 3-6 players are in, the host can begin the game.

You can find more info on the game at the official website.

Developed by Banned Bandits Studios: Milo Fisher, Justin Lao, Pierce Sullivan, Ethan Erh, Emily Wen, Julian Cady, Brandon Wong
